attributes.review: I wanted to support our amazingly orange president with the most amazing logic, but alas, as soon as I opened the app it started glitching! 😡 I was locked out of my phone, a virus started deleting all of my other apps, and the FBI showed up and kidnapped my dog and ate her 😭😭😭. Please do not get this app, or else your phone will be broken. I had to get a new one because the app destroyed my previous one.
attributes.title: do not get!!!!

attributes.review: This agenda is clearly satanic spreading hate and war throughout America even though he is a so called Christian. While I am not judging him myself, he most likely doesn’t know a single bible verse because when asked in an interview he said “I like them all.” If you download this app you are receiving the Mark of the Beast with the satanic meaning behind the little T on the app. Do not give in to Satan. God bless and pray for Trump.
attributes.title: MARK OF THE BEAST

attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I had seen it was getting some hate and was wondering what that was all about. So I downloaded the app and it was a lovely app but for so reason as soon as I got past the  login screen that’s where things turned south, and this is because all I saw were Cheetos and annoying oranges so I think as you remove that it will be an okay app!
attributes.title: Poopoo pants mago

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support my glorious leader but after I downloaded it my skin slowly started turning orange, my hair started falling out and I received a blonde wig in the mail, and all of a sudden I had an urge to tell my daughter I would’ve dated her if she wasn’t related to me. It destroyed my family and since I’ve divorced I’ve dedicated my time to insult every one I see who does not support our king.
attributes.title: Clones?

attributes.review: I downloaded this app hoping to find information on our great country but instead was prompted with an orange, bigoted, ignorant. misogynistic, racist sex offender. I am deeply offended by this and for that reason I will leave your app with 1 star. maybe if this candidate tried to fix this injustices in this country then i would leave a higher rating. which a 0 star review was possible 🤢
attributes.title: terrible app

attributes.review:
I am a true believer in our wonderful president Donald J. Trump and support him unconditionally. However this app is not what I expected from the savior of our country. 🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸
From the coding to the programming of this app I am truly unsatisfied.😔😔
This is a disappointment especially since I was looking forward to using this app to feel closer to Mr. Trump in the months leading to his re-election.
Anyway, Trump 2020. Go out and vote 😁🇺🇸
attributes.title: Not what I voted for!

attributes.review: i got this app so i could see what my fav bunker boy has been up too🥰✨but as soon as i downloaded the application it asked for my credit card info💵💳which i of course gave because i would do anything for my don don😍🧡but then soon after i got a loud knocking at my door🚪and it was none other than the cheeto man’s son, barron! 👨‍👦he then looked into my deep blue orbs and i tucked my messy hair behind my ear 👂🏻. as soon as looked back at him he took me by the arm and threw me into my yard as he walked into my house and locked me out😭🔒i am now homeless and have no money because of trumpy pie and his son bar bar. and it is all because of this app. 🏚
attributes.title: horrific

attributes.review: Come on. He tried to take away my rights, my friends rights, strangers rights, and the list will go on. He fired the pandemic team, look where we are now. I’m not allowed to have control over my body if I want an abortion? I’m a terrorist now too? Will I get to live into my 30’s? Will I even live past my 20’s? This is worthy of -5 stars. He is a awful person. Don’t forgot that.
attributes.title: Really?

attributes.review: I downloaded this app in full support of my president Donald J Trump, and it worked amazing for the first 5 minutes. But then it started showing me videos of terrorist antifa rioting and looting my beloved country.  I can’t believe that the president that i once voted for in 2016 would support terrorists. I mean it’s one thing for him to support the very nice white supremacists, but how dare he believe that people that support blm deserve rights?!?!
attributes.title: Trump supports Antifa?

attributes.review: When I found out that I could finally communicate with his holiness through the intertoobs I was so excited!! I was unfortunately unimpressed with the app as it mislead me and I was only able to contact him if I was under 16 which was very confusing. Hopefully I can meet him at our worlds final ending as he rises like a Phoenix to save us all. Until then I will just be licking boots and yeehawing. 🥰
attributes.title: Wow
